name: Speed Up - Infinite Cube Run
description:
SPEED UP is a fast-pace, gravity twisting infinite runner about the thrill of speed and and your reaction skills.
It is simple, but not easy: it follows the tradition of arcade games that are easy to learn and almost impossible to master.
The further you go the faster it gets.
Can you handle the speed?

Features:
+ 3 difficulties
+ 2 game modes: Level Mode, Infinity Mode
+ 15 different speed-stages in the Level Modes
+ 25 different speed-stages in Infinity Mode
+ Super high Speed action
+ Beat you own high scores
+ Countless obstacles to overcome
+ Unlimited fun!
